General.Name: Prism
General.Description:
Prism is a Blockchain-as-a-Service development and production environment. PRM offers Dapp development and E Language coding support

Prism reached their ICO goal and sucessfully destributed 28500000 PRM
General.Technology: Triple Layer Blockchain (TLB): A single blockchain with three different layers to handle various functions.

ICO.Description:
Crowdsale fund destination: 75% Development, 10% Marketing and Community Support, 5% Developers funding for initial network sustain and processes, 10 % Legal Contingency Fund

PRM tokens are based on PoS system with a fixed rate of 1% yearly, so holders are incentivised to vault their funds and receive PoS rewards instead of selling them in the brief period until PRISM alpha launches.

Note: All blog posts have been deleted along with the twitter account.
